thread.title: ChemPoint signs deal with Corbion to distribute pationic and lactylates in Canada
thread.title_full: ChemPoint signs deal with Corbion to distribute pationic and lactylates in Canada

title: ChemPoint signs deal with Corbion to distribute pationic and lactylates in Canada
text:
ChemPoint signs deal with Corbion to distribute pationic and lactylates in Canada 15 October 2015 
US chemical distribution group ChemPoint has signed an agreement with Corbion to distribute Pationic glycerol esters and lactylates in Canada. 
Under the deal, ChemPoint, a subsidiary of Univar, will assist technical support and manage order placement and fulfillment for Pationic glycerol ester and lactylate customers in Canada. 
Corbion's Pationic glycerol esters and lactylates are available in various forms, and polymer manufacturers can produce a wide range of plastic-based packaging and durable goods. "Expanding our relationship with Corbion is a great opportunity for us to jointly provide greater support to the compounder market across North America." 
Pationic products support polymer production requirements, and also act as lubricants, dispersants, processing aids, and acid or catalyst neutralisers, as well as imparting antistatic, antifogging, and mold release properties. 
ChemPoint North America sales director Rick Hoener said: "Expanding our relationship with Corbion is a great opportunity for us to jointly provide greater support to the compounder market across North America. 
"Corbion is a long-standing, valued supplier, and we look forward to driving the continued growth of our relationship now and well into the future." 
ChemPoint and Corbion have been working together for more than eight years, and the latest agreement is an expansion of their relationship. 
Both the companies provide specialty, bio-based products, and dedicated sales, distribution, and technical support to their customers. 
Currently, ChemPoint provides support for other Corbion polymer and bakery industry products throughout the US and Mexico. 
Corbion Biochemicals sales vice-president Mark Concannon said: "Corbion has enjoyed a distribution relationship with ChemPoint for our Pationic products in the US over the past several years, during which time we have seen significant growth. 
"We are excited to expand our polymer additives distribution relationship with ChemPoint into Canada, and expect that their prowess will result in a positive experience for current and prospective customers." 
Corbion supplies lactic acid, lactic acid derivatives, lactides and emulsifiers, functional enzyme blends, minerals, and vitamins. 
The company is also involved in production of bio-based products from renewable resources for sectors such as the bakery, meat, pharmaceuticals and medical devices, home and personal care, packaging, automotive, coatings, and adhesives industries. Follow Us:
